title: VISA 210 Digital Arts
description: Examination of current art practices and issues related to digital technologies and contemporary culture. Technical instruction in image and sound manipulation with an emphasis on the theoretical conceptualization of digital artistic media.
prerequisites: Minimum 72% in each of VISA 180 or 182, VISA 183 and VISA 110.  Students who do not have the appropriate pre-requisites will be de-registered and should contact the Department.
